#summary New and Noteworthy features in 0.9.0
#labels Audience-Users,Featured

Released on May 6th, 2009

The 0.9.0 release is the first release after moving the code to the Eclipse Foundation as Eclipse IAM

Plugin now targets Eclipse 3.4.x, although some features can still work in 3.3.x

 * Reworked the builder for improved performance
  * Changes to pom sections that don't affect the build won't trigger it
 * More performance improvements
 * Form based POM editor
 * Edit settings file from within Eclipse
 * Sync eclipse compiler config with maven-compiler-plugin config
 * Nexus repository manager index support in dependency search


For a complete list of changes, check the [http://code.google.com/p/q4e/issues/list?can=1&q=milestone%3A0.9.0+status%3AFixed%2CVerified&sort=milestone&colspec=ID+Type+Status+Priority+Milestone+Owner+Summary&cells=tiles Changelog]
